title: Essential IT Skills for Everyone
section: Accelerate your career with expertise in Excel, PowerPoint and Word!
text:
Accelerate your career with expertise in Excel, PowerPoint and Word!

It doesn‚Äôt matter if you are an under-graduate student or a working professional.
It doesn‚Äôt matter if you are in an IT or a non-IT profession.
It doesn‚Äôt matter if you are a businessperson or working professional.
It doesn‚Äôt matter if you know nothing about Excel, PowerPoint or Word.

No matter who you are, it is highly unlikely that your life is not influenced by these tools or by people using these tools.
By the end of this 1-week course, you will understand how to leverage these tools to effectively bump up your productivity, and save hours of precious time for yourself.

title: R for Data Analysis and Reporting
section: Accelerate your career with expertise in Data Analysis and Reporting with
text:
Accelerate your career with expertise in Data Analysis and Reporting with 
By the end of this 1-week course, you will understand how to leverage R and RStudio Desktop to accelerate in your data journey, save time and open doors to new opportunities.

title: R for Data Analysis and Reporting
text:
Why R?
R is a powerful programming language commonly used for statistical computing and data analysis. It has a large and active community, which makes it easy to find help when you need it.
R has a simple and easy-to-learn syntax, making it a good choice for beginners. Additionally, R is open-source and free to use, which means you don‚Äôt need to spend money to learn it.
Learning R will also help you in data visualization, machine learning and statistical analysis which are useful skills in today‚Äôs data-driven world.

‚ÄúR is not a language driven by the purity of its philosophy; R is a language designed to get shit done.‚Äù ‚Äî @hadleywickham, rstudioconf2022.






R is also widely used in many industries, such as finance, healthcare, and technology, which means you will have many job opportunities once you learn it.

Enroll Now, limited seats only!
